actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide free postal service to the States and political subdivisions thereof for the mailing of sample ballots in connection with elections conducted by such States and political subdivisions.

summary.text: Authorizes the postage-free mailing of sample ballots in connection with any election conducted by any State or political subdivision thereof. Sets forth criteria for such ballots to qualify for postage-free delivery.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide free postal service to the States and political subdivisions thereof for the mailing of sample ballots in connection with elections conducted by such States and political subdivisions.
